title: un tiru nAmam
sahitya:
un tiru nAmam ninaiyAdadu tirivEnO


anupallavi

  paNpaDum kATSi ellAm un karuNai vaDivAi kANumpOdum EnO nAn


caraNam    maN payanura uzhaippOrkku manam uyarndiDa vazhi kATTum tavattOrkkum
kaLiyonrE ariyum sIrArkkum eLidAna iNaiyE un cintaiyil manam sella tuNai marandE nALum
